#summary Frequently Asked Questions

= How to start pgp encrypt most quickly? =

Type {{{ /PGP START }}} on a query (dialog) chat tab/window!

= How do i use my secondary secret key for signing? =

{{{
/PGP IDENT my_other@key.net
}}}

= Does pgp-layer plugin follow nick change on established sessions? =

Only if you are on same chennel as your peer. (ie. you got "Change Nick" event)
